21-0020.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the State Legislation Committee meeting held Thursday, September 9, 2020.A motion was made by Vice Chair Uranga, seconded by Chair Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Austin, Uranga and RichardsonPage 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTUESDAY, JANUARY 5, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSTATE LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTES2.

21-0021.summary: Recommendation to receive and file staff recommendations for the City’s 2021 State Legislative Agenda, and forward the State Legislation Committee’s recommendations to the City Council for adoption. Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and presented the staff report.Chair Richardson spoke.Vice Chair Uranga spoke.Councilman Austin spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Councilman Austin and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Chair Richardson spoke.Dave Shukla spoke.A motion was made by Chair Richardson, seconded by Member Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Austin, Uranga and Richardson3.
